segments.text: Excuse me . I'm afraid I got lost . Where am I on this map ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are here , bus station , we are in the heart of the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! Can I go from here to the Zhongshan Park ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Head straight up the street about two blocks then turn right .
segments.speaker: S2
